column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This review is for someone who would order gluten free pizza
column2: which is what I got.  The crust was mediocre
column3: but I know they offer it as an aside and it's not their specialty; nevertheless
column4: I've had excellent gluten free pizza at Marcellos back in Florida.  Having said that
column5: Others at my table ordered the classic and personal pan pizzas and loved their pizza.
